articles.description: Out singer Christian Chavez is ready to bring it as RBD kicks off their 'Soy Rebelde' reunion world tour in Texas tonight.
articles.content:
After 15 years, Mexican pop sensation RBD is reuniting tonight (Friday, August 25th) to launch their Soy Rebelde World Tour in El Paso, Texas.
